word.name: Engine
word.definition: Vital part of a vehicle that allows its movement.

word.name: Supercharger
word.definition: A component of a car's engine that gives the said engine more power by using crankshaft revolutions.

word.name: Turbocharger
word.definition: A component of a car's engine that gives the said engine more power by using exhaust fumes.

word.name: Formula 1
word.definition: A competition which involves racing on varied circuits, for a certain amount of laps.

word.name: Formula D
word.definition: A competition which involves cars Drifting around a designed circuit to earn style points.

word.name: Nascar
word.definition: An American competition which involves racing in an oval circuit, counterclockwise, for a certain amount of laps.

word.name: Processor
word.definition: A component of a Computer that executes all the operations.
